casebody.data:
J. P. DEVINE COMPANY, Plaintiff in Error, v. BISHOPRIC & LENT COMPANY, Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 2, 1927. No. 299. Kenefick, Cooke, Mitchell & Bass, of Buffalo, N. Y. (Lyman M. Bass, of Buffalo, N. Y., of counsel), for plaintiff in error. Williams & Williams, of Buffalo, N. Y., for defendant in error.

Before MANTON and SWAN, Circuit Judges, and CAMPBELL, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
